DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Relative Effectiveness Two Feeding Interventions Treatment Moderate Acute Malnutrition
DOC.detailed_description: This research protocol embed component UN World Food Programme ( WFP ) -supported Supplementary Feeding programme Ethiopia . The propose study prospective cluster-randomized equivalence trial compare relative effectiveness two feed intervention four woredas ( district ) . Research implement two comparable woredas ( one CSB one RUSF ) , two different area Sidama zone represent different livelihood zone , main source crop income , level food insecurity
DOC.criteria: All child 6 60 month age identify malnourish base MUAC measurement WFH ≥70 < 80 % . Children WFH < 70 % present bilateral pitting oedema ( refer therapeutic feeding programme ) . Children illness clinical condition prevents safely ingest either supplementary food . A child medically assess upon admission complicate clinical condition ( oedema , malaria , vomit , chronic diarrhea , infection , appetite , etc ) would require medical care child refer therapeutic feeding programme . All child transfer therapeutic feeding programme directly supplementary feeding programme however include research study . Children WFH > 80 % MUAC 110 120 mm admit SFP however include research study .
